mapper.select: select * from population_time where f like concat('%',#{address},'%') order by a DESC limit 1
select * from population_location where F like concat('%',#{address},'%') order by a DESC limit 1

select avg(f+g)+avg(t+u) J,avg(h+i)+avg(v+w) K,avg(j+k)+avg(x+y) L,avg(l+m)+avg(z+aa) M,avg(n+o)+avg(ab+ac) N,avg(p+q+r)+avg(ad+ae+af) O, avg(f+g) P,avg(h+i) Q,avg(j+k) R,avg(l+m) S,avg(n+o) T,avg(p+q+r) U, avg(t+u) V,avg(v+w) W,avg(x+y) X,avg(z+aa) Y,avg(ab+ac) Z,avg(ad+ae+af) AA from local_people_dong where c like concat('%',#{dongcode},'%') order by A desc limit 24;
select g from address_code where c like concat('%',#{predoroname},'%') limit 1
select * from (select * from local_people_dong where c like concat('%',#{dongcode},'%')) TT order by A desc limit 24;
